name: DEA - E-Commerce Program
description: DEA's Controlled Substance Ordering System allows for electronic orders of controlled substances without the supporting paper form DEA-222. All current information regarding CSOS is available on www.DEAecom.gov. DEA's CSOS program allows for secure electronic controlled substances orders without the supporting paper DEA Form 222. Using a technology called PKI, CSOS requires that each individual purchaser enroll with DEA to acquire a CSOS digital certificate.
